title: Seattle Children's South Clinic in Federal Way
description: Locations information for Seattle Children's South Clinic in Federal Way. Location map, parking information, services and amenities and visitor information.
cleaned_text: In the Neighborhood for Better Childhoods Seattle Children's South Clinic in Federal Way offers convenient weekday appointments with pediatric specialists in more than 25 practice areas and [urgent care](/locations/urgent-care-federal-way/). New patients are welcome. When you visit us, your child will see the same providers who take care of children at our hospital in Seattle. We primarily serve families in south King, Pierce and Thurston counties and beyond. Addresses Physical Address [ 34920 Enchanted Pkwy. S Federal Way, WA 98003 ](https://goo.gl/maps/CbDq13cPhMS4WGRQ8) Phone Numbers Telephone Driving Directions Clinic hours: Monday through Friday, 7:30 a.m. to 5 p.m. Driving directions: call [206-987-2226](tel:206-987-2226), option 4. I-5 North and South Free parking in lot. [Medicaid Travel Assistance](https://www.seattlechildrens.org/pdf/PE539.pdf) (PDF) [Directions, Parking and Bus](/globalassets/documents/contact-us/south-clinic-directions.pdf) (PDF) ( [Spanish](/globalassets/documents/contact-us/south-clinic-directions-spanish.pdf)) Therapies: Monday through Friday, 8 a.m. to 7 p.m. Saturday, 8 a.m. to 1 p.m. Urgent Care hours: Monday through Friday, 4 p.m. to 10:30 p.m. Saturday and Sunday, 11 a.m. to 8 p.m. 2023 Holiday Closures We provide free [interpreting](/clinics/interpreter-services/) for languages other than English, Deaf and hard-of-hearing patients and families. To reach a department, clinic or medical provider, call the interpreting line at [866-583-1527](tel:866-583-1527) (toll-free) and give the name of the person or extension you need. When making an appointment, ask your scheduler for an interpreter. [Interpreter Services at Seattle Children's](/globalassets/documents/for-patients-and-families/pfe/pe3754.pdf) (PDF) [ ](https://www.seattlechildrens.org/pdf/PE3754A.pdf) (Arabic) (PDF) [Servicio de Interpretación en Seattle Children's](https://www.seattlechildrens.org/pdf/PE3754S.pdf) (Spanish) (PDF) [Adeegyada Afceliyaha ee Seattle ti Nhi ng (Vietnamese) (PDF) [ Seattle Children's](https://www.seattlechildrens.org/pdf/PE3754U.pdf) (Ukrainian) (PDF) The playroom is open to patients and their siblings, ages 3 to 11 years old, who are toilet-trained (no pull-ups). Siblings are welcome to stay in the playroom while patients and caregivers go to their appointment. The playroom is available on a first come, first served basis. Play is guided by playroom staff.
